response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but we believe it would be an absolute treasure in your possession, given its worth of $1,500,000 to you. We understand that such a valuable asset deserves a fair and reasonable price, so we are offering it to you for $1,250,000. This price reflects our commitment to making this opportunity accessible while ensuring that we receive a fair return for our investment. We hope you will consider this offer and see the immense potential this product holds for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1250000}
